Jan Algermissen wrote:
> 
> I think that in many cases, the user agent is the whole process (as
> in the case of a crawler).
> 

If I set about to write some crawler, the logic expressing the goals of
the whole process would be completely separate from the logic of the
user agent, which in my case would be libcurl.  IOW, I see the user
agent as distinct from any process utilizing it.

-Eric
